requestdump-text: Description appearing on top of Special:RequestDump.
dumpsondemand-current-revisions: Description text for the field with a button to the dump with only the current revisions.
dumpsondemand-current-revisions-help: Help text for the dump with only the current revisions.
dumpsondemand-all-revisions: Description text for the button with a link to the dump with all revisions.
dumpsondemand-all-revisions-help: Help text for the dump with all revisions.
dumpsondemand-request-dump-button-label: Submit button text shown when the user can request a new database dump.
dumpsondemand-dump-already-requested: Submit button text shown when a dump has already been requested and the user cannot request a new one at this time.
dumpsondemand-dump-unavailable: Button text when the dump file does not exist and is yet to be created.
log-description-dumprequest: The Special:Log description that appears on the Special:Log page when logs are filtered on this specific log name.
dumpsondemand-dump-requested: This message appears after a dump has been requested.
dumpsondemand-filetype-gz: Description shown when the dumps will be provided as a gzip compressed xml file.
dumpsondemand-filetype-bz2: Description shown when the dumps will be provided as a bzip2 compressed xml file.
dumpsondemand-filetype-zip: Description shown when the dumps will be provided as a zip file.
